description: Purchase crowdsourced wireless data across Canada
duration_in_months: .portion of the year (1-12) of expected contract term
full_summary:
***Crowdsourced Wireless Data***
=====================================

**Invitation to Bid (ITB) Number**: cb-269-3637136

**ITB Title:** Bundled Crowdsourced Wireless Data Solutions

**Publication Date:** December 8, 2023
**Bid Closing Date:** January 17, 2024 14:00 (Eastern Standard Time)

**Description:**
Innovation, Science, and Economic Development Canada (ISED) invites bids to provide crowdsourced wireless data collected across Canada. The data will consist of geolocated measurements of wireless network access metrics via mobile networks and WiFi networks. The bid is also open to companies that can provide similar data for the United States of America (USA) on an optional basis.
 
**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
**Procurement Category:** SRV (Services)
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding

**Selection Criteria:**
The proposal will be evaluated based on a combination of technical merit and price, with the highest score winning.

**Contract Information:**
* Expected Contract Start Date: February 1, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: January 31, 2025

**Points of Contact:**

* Anne Nino
	+ Email: [anne.nino@ised-isde.gc.ca](mailto:anne.nino@ised-isde.gc.ca)
	+ Phone: (343) 572-8900
	+ Fax: None
* Address: 3701 Carling Avenue, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada K2K 2Y7

**Related Documents:**
Associated addenda documents related to the ITB are below:
- Addendum 1
- Addendum 2
- Addendum 3
- Addendum 4
- Addendum 5

* [crowdsource-data-service.pdf](crowdsource-data-service.pdf) (CDS Solution)
* [donnees-sans-fil-participatives.pdf](donnees-sans-fil-participatives.pdf) (participatory data collection)

**Trade Agreements:**
ISED is interested in establishing contract with contractors eligible under the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free
